text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Lawna | other_name = | native_name = لونة - حديبو | nickname = | settlement_type = | image_skyline = | imagesize = | image_caption = | pushpin_map = Yemen | pushpin_label_position = bottom | pushpin_mapsize = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Yemen | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = Yemen | subdivision_type1 = Governorate | subdivision_name1 = Socotra | subdivision_type2 = | subdivision_name2 = | | government_footnotes = | government_type = | leader_title = | leader_name = | established_title = | established_date = | area_magnitude = | unit_pref = Imperial | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = |population_as_of = 2004 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 13 | population_note = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone = Yemen Standard Time | utc_offset = +3 | timezone_DST = | utc_offset_DST = | coordinates = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | website = | footnotes = }} Lawna () is a village in Hidaybu (Socotra-East) District. It is located in the Socotra Governorate, According to the 2004 census it had a population of 13 people. ==Other websites== *National Information Center in Yemen Category:Settlements in Yemen Category:Port cities in the Arabian Peninsula Category:Port cities and towns of the Red Sea Category:Villages in Asia
title: Lawna
